text: [Music]
job interview skills a program to master
the difficult stages and situations in a
job interview job interview skills
episode 4 the interview process step 1
handshake and introduction the first
thing the interviewer learns about you
is by how you introduce yourself be very
assured and self-confident when entering
the room offer a handshake and be sure
that it is firm that demonstrates
confidence for example hello my name is
John I am here for my interview look at
the interviewer directly in the eyes and
smile when you meet with a firm but not
hard handshake if you crush the
interviews hand the pain will dim your
lust sure when the introductions are
made be sure to remember the name of the
person interviewing you the interview
will progress on better terms if you're
able to respond using the name of the
person you're speaking to remember not
to get over familiar address the person
respectfully as mr. Ashok or mrs. Shah
use of sir or madam is usually reserved
for very senior people and is not
preferred nowadays after the
introductions are made there should be a
seat offered to you do not assume that
there is a particular place for you wait
until the interview emotions to where he
or she would like to have you sit once
you are seated and introductions are
over the interview is ready to begin
keep in mind that everyone you meet at
the organization is important and might
have input as to the decision to hire
you it is not unlikely for an
interviewer or manager to ask the
receptionist or a counter person for his
or her impressions of you so ensure you
are polite to the receptionist and you
have not had a showdown with the
security staff at the gate this was a
demonstration of video for job interview
skills for complete program visit us at
let's talk company dot in if you like
this video
kindly share your comments which will
encourage just to make more videos for
you you can also subscribe to our
YouTube channel by clicking subscribe
button just above this video thank you
for watching us take care
